contentrichtext.text: {{Orphan|date=August 2008}} '''Jane A. Assimakopoulos''' is an American-born writer and translator who lives in [[Ioannina]], [[Greece]]. ==Life== She graduated from [[Brandeis University]], in 1964.<ref>http://alumni.brandeis.edu/web/reunions/2009/1964/pta.html</ref> Her brother was William Nisselson.<ref>{{cite news| url=http://www.nytimes.com/2001/06/27/arts/william-nisselson-56-head-of-post-production-film-studio.html | work=[[The New York Times]] | title=William Nisselson, 56, Head of Post-Production Film Studio | first=Celestine | last=Bohlen | date=2001-06-27 | accessdate=2010-05-05}}</ref> Assimakopoulos' translations are mostly of [[Greek language|Greek]] books and articles, although she has also translated a few works written in [[French language|French]]. Assimakopoulos has translated these into [[English language|English]], including works translated in [[England]] and in the [[United States]]. The writers whose works she has translated into English include [[Thanassis Valtinos]], [[Yiannis Kontos]], [[Sotiris Dimitriou]], [[Ioannis G. Tsatsaris]] and [[Katerina Anghelaki-Rooke]]. Her most famous translation is of Valtinos' ''Data from the Decade of the Sixties: a Novel''. Her work appeared in ''Metamorphoses''.<ref>http://www.smith.edu/metamorphoses/issues/2002fall.html</ref> ==Works== * [http://wordswithoutborders.org/article/from-the-book-of-andreas-kordopatis-part-i-america/ "From 'The Book of Andreas Kordopatis, Part I, America'" ''Words without Borders''] * {{cite book| url=http://books.google.com/books?id=38oi9UBRYTkC | title=Data from the decade of the sixties: a novel| author=Thanasēs Valtinos| others=Translators Jane Assimakopoulos, Stavros Deligiorgis| publisher=Northwestern University Press| year= 2000| isbn= 978-0-8101-1699-3 }} * {{cite book| url=http://books.google.com/books?id=t0Blz-cs4XUC | title=Deep blue almost black: selected fiction| author=Thanassis Valtinos| others=Translators Jane Assimakopoulos, Stavros Deligiorgis| publisher=Northwestern University Press| year= 2000| isbn= 978-0-8101-1766-2 }} ==References== {{reflist}} {{Authority control|VIAF=53428469}} {{Persondata | NAME = Assimakopoulos, Jane | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Greek writer | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Assimakopoulos, Jane}} [[Category:American expatriates in Greece]] [[Category:American translators]] [[Category:Brandeis University alumni]] [[Category:French–English translators]] [[Category:American women writers]] [[Category:Greek–English translators]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Year of birth missing (living people)]] {{US-translator-stub}} {{Greece-writer-stub}} {{US-writer-stub}}
